title: Tagliarini with red mullet, tomatoes, olives and pangrattato
description: Tagliarini is a ribbon pasta, similar to spaghetti or linguine. The deep-fried breadcrumbs add a satisfying crunch to this summery pasta dish for two.
ingredients: 100g/3½oz stale bread, roughly chopped into coarse crumbs
8 taggiasca or small niçoise olives, pitted
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
